comments.body: So this seems like a not allowed type situation more than a forced unless I'm misreading the code.

The schemes considered here force a download-and-reupload for use with the YARN cache as opposed to allowing them to remain in their original location. I think these lines pretty clearly indicate that this method and the related variables are really a force-download-list:
```
    val forceDownloadArgs = if (blacklistSchemes.nonEmpty) {	    val forceDownloadArgs = if (forceDownloadSchemas.nonEmpty) {
      Seq("--conf", s"spark.yarn.dist.forceDownloadSchemes=${blacklistSchemes.mkString(",")}")
```

However I just noticed that I incorrectly named this as `forceDownloadSchemas` instead of `forceDownloadSchemes`, I will fix this.
